verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you have been favorable <S%H7521><s%> to your land. <S%H776><s%> You have restored <S%H7725><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
You have forgiven <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your people. <S%H5971><s%> You have covered <S%H3680><s%> all their sin. <S%H2403><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
You have taken away <S%H622><s%> all your wrath. <S%H5678><s%> You have turned <S%H7725><s%> from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of your anger. <S%H639><s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> us, <S%H430><s%> God of our salvation, <S%H3468><s%> and cause your indignation <S%H3708><s%> toward us to cease. <S%H6565><s%>
Will you be angry <S%H599><s%> with us forever? <S%H5769><s%> Will you draw out <S%H4900><s%> your anger <S%H639><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations? <S%H1755><s%>
Won't <S%H2421><s%> you revive us again, <S%H7725><s%> that your people <S%H5971><s%> may rejoice in you? <S%H8055><s%>
Show <S%H7200><s%> us your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Grant <S%H5414><s%> us your salvation. <S%H3468><s%>

I will hear <S%H8085><s%> what God, <S%H410><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> will speak, <S%H1696><s%> for he will speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> his saints; <S%H2623><s%> but let them not turn again <S%H7725><s%> to folly. <S%H3690><s%>
Surely his salvation <S%H3468><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him, <S%H3519><s%> that glory may dwell <S%H7931><s%> in our land. <S%H776><s%>
Mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> meet together. <S%H6298><s%> Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> have kissed each other. <S%H5401><s%>
Truth <S%H571><s%> springs out <S%H6779><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> has looked down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Yes, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh will give <S%H5414><s%> that which is good. <S%H2896><s%> Our land <S%H776><s%> will yield <S%H5414><s%> its increase. <S%H2981><s%>
Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H7760><s%> And prepares the way <S%H1870><s%> for his steps. <S%H6471><s%>
